participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Emily loves to explore new ideas and experiences. She is optimistic about her future and enjoys the process of learning.
participant_1.background: I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time. I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers. I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I am from Tennessee. I enjoy making things for my family.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Resilient and thoughtful, Jordan focuses on the positives in life despite challenges. He has a passion for vintage items and enjoys culinary adventures.
participant_2.background: I'd like to be able to weld things. I spend my weekends browsing antique stores. I live in the USA. I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation. I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.

content.text: I'm about to go off to college, I'm excited but also a little nervous!
I know what you mean, I was nervous too when I went to college. But it's a great experience, you'll have a lot of fun!
Yeah I'm looking forward to it! What did you study in college?
I studied business, I'm now a CPA.
Oh that's cool! I'm not sure what I want to study yet, but I'm thinking about something in the arts.
That's a great choice! The arts are so important.
Yeah I think so too, I love to cook and I love to make things.
Me too! I'd love to be able to weld things.
That's awesome! I think it would be really cool to be able to weld things too.
Maybe we can take a welding class together sometime!
That would be so cool! I'd love that.
Great! We can talk about it more later.
Sounds good! Thanks for talking with me, I feel a little bit better about college now!
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
